descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Seeker VR turns your workout into an adventure. This high-intensity VR fitness game is a fantasy endless runner where you run, jump, duck, and punch through magical worlds. Smash rune-marked crates, dodge spiked logs and buzzing bees, and scoop up coins, sapphires, emeralds, and rubies to brew game-changing potions.

Features you’ll feel:

Real movement: run in place, squat/duck, jump, and throw punches—no fake jogging.

Potions: Time Slow, Shield, Treasure Magnet, and Revive to push deeper and score higher.

Always fresh: dynamic routes, evolving difficulty, and fast session times.

Compete daily: bite-size challenges and global leaderboards.

Progress that sticks: earn ingredients, unlock recipes, define your playstyle.

Play your way: Hand Tracking or controllers; standing/room-scale friendly.

Built for Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, and Meta Quest Pro.

Perfect for 10-minute cardio bursts or longer grinds, Seeker VR blends VR fitness with the rush of an endless runner—so every workout feels like an adventure.

Download Seeker VR and turn sweat into high score.
